text: Palipitile Liduva lya Kuyewelela, Maliya wa imanga ya Magidala na Salome pamo na Maliya anyokwe Yakobo, nkusuma mahuta la kunung'ila uchinga vakaupake mmili wanga Yesu.16:1 Maeleso layâmba Liduva lya Kuyewelela, lola Misamiati ya malove lakamajanga la Nnilailano lya Hambi lavêle kunyuma chitabu achino.
